t: Nine Inch Nails - The Slip [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: The Slip (also known as Halo 27) is the eighth major studio release by Industrial Rock act Nine Inch Nails. The album was produced by Trent Reznor alongside Atticus Ross and Alan Moulder. The album features vocals and traditional song structures, unlike its 2008 counterpart Ghosts I-IV.

t: Nine Inch Nails - Ghosts I-IV [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: Ghosts I - IV is a great work of music that I think is going to appeal to more than just the hardcore NIN fan. It's hard to imagine being shocked by anything Nine Inch Nails puts out, but I would have to say I was at least surprised by this new album from Trent Reznor's brainchild.
